website_summaries.verdict: These composite frame sunglasses offer great protection and stay put even when running.
pros: Despite the low price, these glasses are comfortable and attractive
Composite frame does a good job of holding the glasses in place during bike rides or runs
Several lens types and colors are available
cons: Some customers find that the lens is not large enough to provide wind protection

customer_reviews.title: These are fine
customer_reviews.text: These are polarized horizontally. I previously thought it was polarized at 45 degrees, but it turned out that it was my monitor screen that was polarized at 45. The front is highly reflective of yellow light. You can easily see your reflection, so it makes for an interesting style.
customer_reviews.author: C. He

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Didn't hold up. One time in the pool and lenses started peeling. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: nahooter

customer_reviews.title: Great for cycling
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty solid sunglasses for athletics. I use them for road cycling and they fit great and allow for great clear coverage. The case is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leaver

customer_reviews.title: I would have picked the one with no mirror like lenses Bec this kinda looked outdated for my taste
customer_reviews.text: Light and worked well while running. I would have picked the one with no mirror like lenses Bec this kinda looked outdated for my taste. But performance wise, this worked out well and stayed on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pair of these - this one and the clear/UV lens with the same shape. They fit great, are very light and seem to hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Woodall

customer_reviews.title: 40 percent light blocking? Give or take
customer_reviews.text: Comfirtable fit. The irridescent mirror lens is Extremely dark, only usable on a sunny day at a sandy beach.
customer_reviews.author: Cold Bamboo

customer_reviews.title: Why pay more for the same functionality??
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are SUPER light and if you want something cost effective that WORKS, get these!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas B.

customer_reviews.title: they work, but fit big and feel cheap.
customer_reviews.text: They feel cheaply made, as they squeak in a very plasticy way when they are flexed at all. They also fit very large and that's why I will be returning them. that being said, they do the job of protecting your eyes while riding and the polarization is effective.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Rafferty Shane

customer_reviews.title: These are comfortable, stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable, stylish and sturdy. I agree with other reviewers that they are surprisingly nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gratefully2012

customer_reviews.title: They need to strengthen the frame.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these! All 3 of them cracked in the exact same spot. The frame just above my right eye cracked each time. It has to be a manufacturing problem. The lenses are great and the glasses were quite comfortable until the frame breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Isael Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price on these sunglasses. Good glare protection in bright sunlight and yet crystal-clear vision.
customer_reviews.author: audiomark

customer_reviews.title: Frame broke
customer_reviews.text: They were great until the plastic frame snapped. Lasted about a dozen cycling rides.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Collard

customer_reviews.title: But other than that they're pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: They're not dark enough. But other than that they're pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Rodiguez

product_meta.title: J+S Active PLUS Cycling Outdoor Sports Athlete's Sunglasses, Polarized, 100% UV protection (Black Frame/Golden Sunset Mirror Lens)
product_meta.description:
Polarized, scratch resistant, 100% UV rated sunglasses with high optical clarity for your active lifestyle.

Choose from one of the four lens options to cater for different sports, riding, biking, and cycling needs:

Clear/transparent Lens - A must have for outdoor activities during dawn/dusk and any low light conditions. Protect against dust and rain when you're riding on the road, twigs and other debris when mountain biking.

Yellow Lens - Great for riding or driving at night by reducing glare from oncoming traffic. Aids vision in foggy or cloudy days, by building up contrast and enhance depth perception. They are the perfect choice for mountain bikers, cyclers, hunters, and shooters.

Black/Charcoal Lens - The most popular general purpose lens - excellent for bright sunny days - dark grey lenses allows true colors and reduce glare to provide day-long comfort - perfect for runners, cyclists, golfers and water sports.

Brown - Great for all round weather, even better for cloudy or hazy days as brown can enhance contrast and add brightness to your vision - an excellent overall lens!

*Each sold separately.

Measurements: 
- Overall Width: 148mm
- Lens Width:68mm
- Lens Height: 44mm
- Temple Length: 130mm
- Bridge Width: 14mm

BONUS: All J+S sunglasses comes gift packaged ready, making these sunglasses a wonderful yet practical gift idea for your active friends and family!

Backed by 30 DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE and a 1 YEAR WARRANTY*

Order your J+S Active Plus Cycling Outdoor Sunglasses and join thousands of other satisfied customers who LOVE the J+S Vision difference!
feature_bullets: POLARIZED & FLASH MIRROR LENS – J+S polarized multi layer specialised filter lens are are tough, lightweight, scratch resistant, and have high optical clarity (distortion free, clear vision), making them an excellent choice for general outdoor and water sports activities. Now comes with additional reflective optical coating (Revo/Flash Mirror Lens) - design to reflect and minimize glare from the harshest sunglight providing ultimate comfort and improved visibility.

POLYCARBONATE LENS – PC lens are tough, lightweight, scratch resistant, have high optical clarity (distortion free, clear vision) and are up to 10 times more impact-resistant than plastic or glass lenses, making them an excellent choice for outdoor sports activities. Originally developed in the 70s for aerospace applications, they are now the preferred choice of material for children’s glasses and safety glasses.

PERFECT FOR OUTDOORS – designed with a moulding, encompassing frame with anti-slip legs for extra grip behind the ears. They are the perfect choice for active outdoor sports and activities such as Biking, Cycling, Riding, Mountain Biking, Tramping, Hiking, Walking, Fishing, Driving, and Rock Climbing. It is also gift packaged ready, making it a wonderful yet practical gift idea for your active friends and family!

100% RISK FREE PURCHASE - All J+S Sunglasses comes with a 1 year warranty on frames and lens as well as a 30 Day Money Back Guarantee when purchased from the Exclusive authorized seller on Amazon: "jassu". So if you are not completely happy with your purchase for whatever reason, let us know and we'll take care of you.
